about_the_game:
Sometimes all we want is a soundtrack to reflect the cursed zookeeper inside all of us. Composer Peter Nickalls brings you this precise gift with a set of soundtrack-versions of the music from the game. Feel that icy chill, deep down in your bones? That's what it feels like to be close to art.

Current Track Listing:

  • The Zookeeper's Theme (1:15)
  • Daytime in the Zoo (3:00)
  • Nighttime in the Zoo (3:00)
  • Supply and Demand (the shop theme, 1:00)
  • This Looks Bad (1:00)
  • Eldritchery (the menu theme, 1:00)
  • Victory, For Now (0:40)
Files will be available in MP3 format and FLAC. More tracks will be added to the list as the game nears release! Also, any future updates to the game that involve new music will mean a free update to this DLC.

Wishlist this DLC to get an email upon its release!

name: The Eldritch Soundtrack
short_description: Peter Nickall's beautiful soundtrack to The Eldritch Zookeeper. Eldritch tunes for your soul. Add it to your wishlist right now!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
